messages.message:
Minor nit: The first entry in the run table is offset right and not aligned with the rest of the table
I got to this page after running the app with a few documents.

For some context: this can happen with `TableList` since it was built before css subgrid was fully supported on all recent versions of modern browsers. As such is uses flexbox & support `flex` properties for adjusting column sizes. Since each row is a flexbox & each cell can flex, the rows can get out of alignment if there’s overflowing content.

`TableGrid` is newer & uses `subgrid` so this will never be an issue on any newer tables as long as they’re built with this newer table component.

Ohh I was wondering why this was! I think you saw the PRs but yeah my solution was to make the offending columns fixed width, and as a longer term fixed I converted it to a TableGrid. In case anyone was curious!
